Light_Opening.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Moderate_Opening.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Moderate_Bridge.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Moderate_Bridge.display_target_help: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

AoE_Bridge.display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Follow_Up.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to Damage and To Hit for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow
Follow_Up.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased your attack and damage for a short duration.

Taunt.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast
Taunt.display_target_help: You have been confronted and taunted.

Special_1.display_help: Unleashes a series of strong attacks on your foe, dealing high lethal damage and knocking them down. This power is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Special_2.display_help: You make a sweeping strike with your blades, hitting all foes in a cone in front of you and dealing moderate lethal damage to each. This power is the finishing move for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate

High_Low.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of attacks on all foes in a cone in front of you, dealing moderate lethal damage to each foe hit. This power is the opening move for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
